channel.title: Jungfraujoch on Nii's Travel Blog

item.title: Jungfraujoch
item.description: I’m in that photo, the tiny red speck. The Top of Europe! Jungfraujoch is the tallest peak in Europe (or so I’ve been led to believe). So since we were both physically bad at hiking mountains and dealing with subzero temperatures, we thought it would be a good idea to go! A pic from the top. The Journey Actually getting to Jungfraujoch we very difficult and pretty much everything that could go wrong did (a common theory of mine).
